summary: A mockumentary that depicts the final concert of Yosh and Stan Shmenge aka the Happy Wanderers.
cast: John Candy|Eugene Levy|Rick Moranis|Catherine O'Hara|Robin Duke|Mary Margaret O'Hara|John McAndrew|Patricia Hamilton|Marvin Goldhar|Nick Nichols|Don Dickinson|Len Doncheff|Ted Woloshyn|Gord Martineau|Michael Budman|Dave Thomas
title: The Last Polka
